Gabriel Cream Highlighter, Thistle

Brand: Gabriel Cosmetics

Category: Bronzer/Highlighter

Ingredients: BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, EMULSIFYING WAX, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT EXTRACT, MICA, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT, MAGNOLIA ACUMINATA BARK EXTRACT, IRON OXIDES.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
